# Introduction

[Click here](https://github.com/julianstanley/julianstanley.com/raw/master/content/resources/Goldwater_2016.pdf)
to view my project proposal for the 2016 Barry Goldwater award.

I proposed a systematic screen of the regulation between transcription factors
that may regulate aging in *Caenorhabditis elegans*.
